==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しん|てん}}

===Etymology===
[[伸]] (しん, ''shin'': “expand”) + [[展]] (てん, ''ten'': “spread”)

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しんてん}}

# An act of [[expansion]] and [[spreading]] of a [[joint]].
#: 脚の屈曲と'''伸展'''は、股関節、膝関節および足関節の3つの関節によって行われる動作である。
#:: あしのくっきょくと'''しんてん'''は、こかんせつ、ひざかんせつおよびあしかんせつの3つのかんせつによっておこなわれるどうさである。<!-- www.f-edu.fukui-u.ac.jp/~shimizu/flex.htm -->
#:: ''Ashi no kukkyoku to '''shinten''' ha, kokansetsu, hizakansetsu oyobi ashikansetsu no mittsu no kansetsu ni yotte okonawareru dōsa de aru.''
#:: The flexure and '''extension''' of the legs are the movement performed by three joints; a hip joint, a knee joint and ankle joint.
# An act of [[expansion]] and [[spreading]] of a [[range]], [[scale]] or [[influence]].
#: 始まりはケチな強盗事件だったが、バスジャック事件に'''伸展'''したことでメディアなど衆人環視の中の劇場型犯罪となってしまった。<!-- www.amnesty.or.jp/modules/wfsection/article.php?articleid=1059 -->
#:: はじまりはけちなごうとうじけんだったが、ぱすじゃっくじけんに'''しんてん'''したことでめでぃあなどしゅうじんかんしのなかのげきじょうがたはんざいとなってしまった。
#:: ''Hajimari ha kechi na gōtō-jiken datta ga, pasu-jyakku-jiken ni '''shinten''' shita koto de medhia nado shūjin kanshi no naka no gekijō-gata hanzai to natte shimatta.''
#:: The beginning was just a robbery, but after having '''extended''' for a bus hijacking case, it has become a theater-story-like-crime by being exposed in the media and drawing public attentions.

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|an act of expansion and spreading}} [[拡張]] (kakuchō), [[拡大]] (kakudai), [[発展]] (hatten)

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|an act of expansion and spreading of a joint}} [[屈曲]] (kukkyoku)
* {{sense|an act of expansion and spreading of a range, scale or influence}} [[縮小]] (shukushō), [[鎮火]] (chinka)

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|しんてん}}

# To [[expand]] and [[spread]] of a [[joint]].
# To [[expand]] and [[spread]] of a [[range]], [[scale]] or [[influence]].

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|to expand and spread of a joint}} [[伸ばす]] (nobasu)
* {{sense|to expand and spread of a range, scale or influence}} [[拡張|拡張する]] (kakuchō suru), [[拡大|拡大する]] (kakudai suru)

====Antonyms====
* {{sense|to expand and spread of a joint}} [[屈曲|屈曲する]] (kukkyoku suru)
* {{sense|to expand and spread of a range, scale or influence}} [[縮小|縮小する]] (shukushō suru)
